name: GAME OF THE BEAR 2 MUCH TO BEAR
name_original: GAME OF THE BEAR 2 MUCH TO BEAR
description:
GAME OF THE BEAR 2 MUCH TO BEAR

For the ATARI 2600 VIDEO COMPUTER SYSTEM™

A mysterious, but kinda cool starship has abducted Ursulo!

Help Ursulo to escape from the weird paws of ρBear2 the dancing robotic bear

  • Defeat ρBear2 and find the teleporter to return to earth
  • More than 50 screens with perils and puzzle
  • 32k of Puzzle/Platforming action

*It requires an emulator to run it.
